command.text: Sweet {name}, there's a prize waiting for you at the temple!
Sweet {name}, would you do me a solid and run to the top of our completely non-sacrificial temple? I left my shaman's staff up there and I'm screwed without it. You're the best.

Sweet {name}, what a beautiful day it is! The sun is shining! The birds are chirping! Truly, we are blessed by our Gods. Please - join me for a stroll to the top of our temple, so that we can offer our thanks to these deities.
Wonderful {name}, it's been a while since you last worshipped!
Wonderful {name}. I know! It's a Sunday morning and you'd rather be watching the big game. But spend some time worshipping at the temple, yeah?

Wonderful {name}, we mere mortals have but one duty in life. We must please our gods, that they continue to cause the sun to rise in the morning, the rain to water our crops, and the mosquitos to plague our foes, that they might have horrible diarrhea!
Fabulous {name}, go to the festival! Dance like nobody's watching!
Fabulous {name}, it's your birthday! We gonna party like it's your birthday! We gonna sip Octli like it's your birthday?

Fabulous {name}, you've had a hard day. Look at those tired eyes, those calloused feet. I have just the thing for you. Now - don't walk away, hear me out! For your own good, and as your local shaman... no, as your FRIEND, I INSIST you take a vacation; you're killing yourself with the long hours you've been putting in at the office!
